title: Low priority queue time reset

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
im in a low priority queue
but the problem is i waited for some time but when i looked at the timer it reset to 20 minutes when it should have been about 2-3 minutes left

replies.body: Having that timer reset on you like that is a pretty clear sign that your connection had some kind of hiccup which made that timer stop counting. I'd first make to do some general network troubleshooting *just* in case something isn't performing as stable as it could, but also be sure to shoot this screenshot over to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if this keeps happening.
i have this problem too, i create a post but somebody delete .
